definitions.definition: A furrow or groove in an organ or a tissue , especially that marking the convolutions of the surface of the brain .
examples: The sulci and gyri are the grooves and ridges, respectively.

definitions.definition: A region of subparallel grooves or ditches formed by a geological process.

main_definition: ( anatomy ) A furrow or groove in an organ or a tissue , especially that marking the convolutions of the surface of the brain .
secondary_definitions: ( planetology ) A region of subparallel grooves or ditches formed by a geological process.
